article.headline: Albany 53, Boston U. 47
article.story: BOSTON (AP) -- Jamar Wilson had 20 points and eight rebounds and Brent Wilson added 15 to help Albany extend its winning streak to seven with a 53-47 win over Boston University on Thursday. Albany (9-6, 5-0 America East) trailed by 28-26 at halftime but scored the first 12 points of the second half for its first win over BU (5-10,2-2). Kirsten Zoellner tied the game with a layup one minute into the second half, and made another to give the Great Danes the lead for good with 18:08 remaining. Brent Wilson had a pair of 3-pointers and Jamar Wilson converted a steal into a breakaway during the run. Kevin Gardner, who recorded 14 of his 18 points in the second half, pulled BU within 49-47 on a layup with 37 seconds remaining. Jamar Wilson increased Albany's lead on its next possession with a pair of free throws. The Great Danes shot just 35 percent from the field but made nine 3-pointers while BU went just 2-of-16 from beyond the 3-point line. BU trailed most of the first half, but Omari Peterkin sparked a 14-0 run, including scoring the Terriers' final nine points of the period. His layup with 3:25 remaining gave BU its first lead at 23-21. He had 11 points in the game. BU, playing its first home game since Dec. 8, has lost three straight and four of five.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
